post_text: We have learned over 30 years that sometimes ideas take a little longer to grow. Take our client Jason for example! Jason started with Davison back in 2010. Sometimes life gets in the way, and for Jason, his life certainly threw him a curve ball. A poisonous spider bite, buying a house, paying off debt, and bringing in a business partner in 2017 happened, but it didn't stop him! We sometimes want instant success, but we have to remain patient and that's just what this client did. The building process, which begins at brainstorming, didn't start in our factory until June of 2018 and it morphed into a tangible item in November 2018. Remember that staying the course often leads to great things! Stars added for idea security and client confidentiality.
